External

The Set::External class handles Pods from external sources. Pods from external sources don't use the Pod::Sources and are intialized by a given specification.

Inherits from:

Pod::Specification::Set

initialize(specification) #=> External

Returns

External A new instance of External

Source

140 def initialize(specification)
141   @specification = specification
142   @required_by   = []
143   @dependencies  = []
144 end

required_by(dependency, dependent_name) #=> undefined

Source

154 def required_by(dependency, dependent_name)
155   before = @specification
156   super(dependency, dependent_name)
157 ensure
158   @specification = before
159 end

dependencyinherited

Signature

dependency #=> Dependency

Returns

Dependency

A dependency including all the versions requirements of the stored dependencies.

Source

63 def dependency
64   @dependencies.inject(Dependency.new(name)) do |previous, dependency|
65     previous.merge(dependency.to_top_level_spec_dependency)
66   end
67 end

Signature

specification_by_name(name) #=> Specification

Parameters

String name

The name of the specification. It can be the name of the top level parent or the name of a subspec.

Returns

Specification

The specification for the given subspec name, from {specification}.

Source

78 def specification_by_name(name)
79   specification.top_level_parent.subspec_by_name(name)
80 end

required_versioninherited

Signature

required_version #=> Version

Returns

Version The highest version that satisfies {dependency}.

Source

101 def required_version
102   versions.find { |v| dependency.match?(name, v) } ||
103     raise(Informative, "Required version (#{dependency}) not found for `#{name}'.\nAvailable versions: #{versions.join(', ')}")
104 end

Source Files

lib/cocoapods/specification/set.rb:101

versions_by_sourceinherited

Signature

versions_by_source #=> Hash{Source => Version}

Returns

Hash{Source => Version}

All the available versions for the Pod groupped by source.

Source

116 def versions_by_source
117   result = {}
118   sources.each do |source|
119     result[source] = source.versions(name)
120   end
121   result
122 end

Aliases

Pod::Specification::Set#inspect

Source

128 def to_s
129   "#<#{self.class.name} for `#{name}' with required version `#{required_version}' available at `#{sources.map(&:name) * ', '}'>"
130 end
